msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is torn at the top and at the bottom. One kollesis in the center. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: "[Column 7]:
Heron, son of Onnophris, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4
Petheus, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4
Orsenouphis, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Zoidous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 193)
Anchophis, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 149)
Ammonios, son of Ammonios, grandson of Ammonios, mother Tninis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 151)
Maron, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorymphis, mother Apollonous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 186)
Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Phaesis, son of Sisois, son of Phaesis, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 244)
Heras, son of Souchas, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Paouitis, son of Petheus, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 197)
Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Heras, son of Melanas, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamystha (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Pasoxis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Panther, mother Taseus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 199)
Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Pnepheros, son of Esouris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Zoidous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)
Heron, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Aphrodisis, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Onnophrios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus the older, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tamareios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Petaus, son of Esouris, grandfather of Petheus, mother Tkollautis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Herakleides, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Ptolemais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p.167)
Petalos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Pnepheros, son, mother Taeuhemeros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Charmos, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Apollonous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Petheus, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother of Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 204)
Dioskoros, son of Aiaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Thases (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 162)
Ptolemaios, son of Sambas, grandson of Sabinus, mother Aphrodous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Pamonneouis, son of Anchorymphis, grandson of Pamoneouis, mother Didymarion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 197)
Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Herieus, mother Anthia (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Artemas, son of Heron, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 155)
Apynchis, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 154)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

div.ab: "Column 7;Heron, son of Onnophris, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tapetheus, 4 drachmas;;Petheus, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis, 4 drachmas;;The same12th year; the remainder is the administrator fee;Orsenouphis, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Zoidous, 4 drachmas;;Anchophis, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, 4 drachmas;;Ammonios, son of Ammonios, grandson of Ammonios, mother Tninis, 4 drachmas;;Maron, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorymphis, mother Apollonous, 8 drachmas;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, 8 drachmas;;The12th year, the remainder is the administrator fee; ;Phaesis, son of Sisois, son of Phaesis, mother Thaesis, 20 drachmas;;Heras, son of Souchas, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus, 8 drachmas;;Paouitis, son of Petheus, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, 4 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas, 4 drachmas;;Heras, son of Melanas, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamystha, 8 drachmas;;The total for the day 140 drachmas, obols 11 of which 12th year 8 drachmas, obols 11.;The 23rd of the same (month);Pasoxis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Panther, mother Taseus, 8 drachmas;;Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas, 8 drachmas;;Pnepheros, son of Esouris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Zoidous, 12 drachmas;;Heron, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, 4 drachmas;;Aphrodisis, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, 8 drachmas;;Onnophrios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, 8 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus the older, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tamareios, 4 drachmas;;Petaus, son of Esouris, grandfather of Petheus, mother Tkollautis, 4 drachmas;;The total for the day 56 drachmas;;The 24th of the same (month);;Herakleides, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Ptolemais, 4 drachmas;;Petalos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Soeris, 8 drachmas;;Pnepheros, son, mother Taeuhemeros, 12 drachmas;;Charmos, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Apollonous, 4 drachmas, obols 8;;12th year the same, ? copper drachmas: ;Petheus, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother of Thermouthis, 16 drachmas;;Dioskoros, son of Aiaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Thases, 16 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas, grandson of Sabinus, mother Aphrodous, 4 drachmas;;Pamonneouis, son of Anchorymphis, grandson of Pamoneouis, mother Didymarion, obols 28;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Herieus, mother Anthia, 4 drachmas;;Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas, 4 drachmas;;Artemas, son of Heron, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis, 8 drachmas;;Apynchis, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, 8 drachmas;;in total for the day 92 drachmas, obols 26;of which 12th year obols [20]."
